extendedInfo.description: This is the ONLY free app of its kind. 100% Free to download and 100% Free to use.Yes WE are the original app that lets you fake everything. Fake your call er id, your voice and even record the call.If you have any questions please email callfakerid@gmail.com or just save it to your contacts just in case.

reviews.title: Fake caller id
reviews.comment: This is the ORIGINAL app that is, the other ones are copy cats and not accurate at all
reviews.author: jossie k

reviews.title: G8 APP!!!!
reviews.comment: AVOID BABY MAMA DRAMA BY CALLIN AND A FAKE # SHOWS UP ON THERE CALLER ID!??
reviews.author: richard charles

reviews.title: CONFUSED
reviews.comment: Maybe I missed something but I tried 2 log n and it asked 4 a pin code I don\'t have. It also won\'t let me buy credits. I emailed the folks but no reply.
reviews.author: Faye Hambric

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Great device... I wish I would have though of it myself...
reviews.author: Michael Powell

reviews.title: Frustration!
reviews.comment: I have been a paying customer for over 1 year now and this app has been great WHEN IT WORKS, however, that is only about 50% of the time. Now they\'ve added ads to the app that are still there even AFTER you pay for it. The site seems to crash multiple times per week and a lot of times you may try to make a call and it will just hang up on you or ring and ring forever or some weird automated voice will come on saying, \"press 1 for....\" and say something that has nothing to do with the app. The worst part is, it charges you tokens that you\'ve paid for, even when it doesn\'t connect. Now when the app does work, it works perfectly. You can call from any number and have it show up on peoples caller ID\'s as whatever you want and it will actually show the name and number of the persons number you are spoofing as if it were them actually calling you. This is the ONLY app like this I have ever seen and I almost wish there were some competitors out there so these guys would step their game up and make the app flawless. For now it\'s a 3 star app with the potential for 5 stars, without a doubt!
reviews.author: Joshua M

reviews.title: Fixed!
reviews.comment: At first it wouldn\'t work in unlimited mode but the good creators of the app went in ad soon as the holiday was over and repaired the issues. They also personally responded to my email and made sure things were.on track. Excellent apparently! Works great in free mode and pay mode. Yes!!
reviews.author: Cole Kter

reviews.title: Free call doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Used to love this app, but now despite claiming the 2 min call is free, without a pin# it just hangs up. Am I doing something wrong?
reviews.author: Shannon Olson

reviews.title: PHENOMENAL
reviews.comment: Tried it on pc worked like a charm. Now I\'m telling all my friends about it!
reviews.author: Paola Wing

reviews.title: Love the app but...
reviews.comment: The two minute free call is nice but I\'d love a way to find out how great the benefits of premium are/can be. I\'d suggest maybe a 3 day trial of premium services for the full effect.
reviews.author: Jonathan Longoria

reviews.title: Natasha :)
reviews.comment: Love this app! Actually works unlike any of the others that I have tried! They either half work or cost
reviews.author: natasha green

reviews.title: It sucks
reviews.comment: It keeps asking me to type my number in setup screen, this really sucks cause I dont see a setup screen.  Horrible app
reviews.author: Rene Martinez

reviews.title: Am I going to get any charges
reviews.comment: I have so much fun with this app but I\'m scared I will get charged of stuff ... its not my phone account... I can\'t afford any charges.  Do I get charged for going over two minutes or will it auto hang up so I don\'t get charged
reviews.author: Catherine Listash

reviews.title: Too good 2 be true?
reviews.comment: What happens if I go over three calls in a 24 hour period?
reviews.author: Gabe Gillespie

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love it and it does exactly what it\'s supposed to. The only thing that would make it better is if you could use voices that sound real and not chipmunk and the slow man voice
reviews.author: Erica Marrs

reviews.comment: Cool app it really works !
reviews.author: yesenia pena

reviews.title: Total scam
reviews.comment: I PAID FOR CREDITS BECAUSE I WANTED TO USE THE APP WITHOUT ISSUES AND ADVERTS. THEY CHARGED MY CARD, GAVE ME CREDITS AND THEN WOULD NOT LET ME USE THE APP UNTIL I TALKED TO SUPPORT. THERE IS NO WAY OF CONTACTING SUPPORT EXCEPT BY EMAIL. SO I WAS UNABLE TO EVEN USE THE APP WHEN I NEEDED IT. NOW TRYING TO GET A REFUND IS IMPOSSIBLE. WHAT A SCAM!!
reviews.author: Jack Donaldson

reviews.title: Read Reviews
reviews.comment: I\'ve read the recent reviews and installed app again (it worked years ago) now IT\'S GARBAGE! !! Junk!!
reviews.author: Tyshell P

reviews.title: ....My experience
reviews.comment: It was fun to use but hard to download! :(
